## ScriptingSystemOptions type

Options for configuring a `ScriptingSystem`<!-- -->.

**Signature:**

```typescript
type ScriptingSystemOptions = {
    VFS?: VFS;
    scriptsRoot?: string;
    editorMode?: boolean;
    importComment?: string;
    onLoadError?: (e: unknown, id: string) => void;
};
```
